p: Based on an HIV-1 cell-cell fusion method that uses a computer-controlled digital image analysis system for automatic quantitation ( Lu et al., 2003), a modified method was developed to screen inhibitors targeting MERS-CoV S protein ( Lu et al., 2014). To test potential fusion inhibitors, effector cells stably expressing the MERS-CoV spike protein S2S and EGFP were used to mediate fusion with target cells expressing the DPP4 receptor ( Lu et al., 2014).
